title: Champion Mastery is great, unless you're leveling support
body:
{{champion:201}}  game, score 3/2/21, where i have 86% kill participation, 12 kda, half my teams wards placed, and as much cs as i could get with my charges given i was roaming
{{champion:8}}  game, score  8/4/2, where i only have 23% kill participation, 2.5 kda, average wards placed, but i have over 260 cs in 36 minutes. 
Does the new mastery system really put that much weight on how much you can cs? if so that makes it hard for support enthusiasts to get higher mastery levels at a similar rate to more offensive roles.
This isn't a rant saying champion mastery is a bad system, i think its great, but when i see my points per game in the post game menu are less in a game where i played (personally) very well when compared to a game where i basically afk farmed/pushed my lane/killed anyone infront of me, then it makes you wonder how the points are all scored/weighted.
